Module com.pld.agile
Package com.pld.agile.controller

Class ComputingTourState

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.controller.ComputingTourState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
public class ComputingTourState extends Object implements State
State when the map and a list of requests are loaded, and the tour is computing. User can either wait or stop the tour computation.
